title: Are your ready for more NFL football in 2021? (Podcast)
itunes:title: Are your ready for more NFL football in 2021? (Podcast)
description:
Michael Barr and Mike Lynch break down some of the biggest sports business stories of the week. Today the duo chats about the first week of NBA action, the AP’s athletes of the year and the NFL’s plan to expand the season to a 17 game schedule in 2021. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
